file_content.text: Again, Darth Angral underestimates you.
Twenty years, I've avoided becoming a casualty of Sith madness. But, an order is an order.
Obligations are what shape our lives.
I understand.
We're not so different. For some reason, that's a comfort.
This isn't about duty. It's about your pride.
Don't make excuses.
You're correct. I'm proud to serve the Empire.
You have my sympathy.
I served the Empire as best I could. I have no regrets.
If you had any self-respect, you would've refused to serve Angral.
Fool.
I've never broken the chain of command. That is my self-respect.
Regardless, you are the victor here. How do you wish to proceed?
I'll hand you over to the Republic military. You'll be a prisoner of war.
I'm taking you in.
My loyalties forbid that, but you've been a worthy adversary.
I won't ask you to tarnish yourself by killing me....
Farewell, Jedi.
Angral will kill you for failing. You can't return to the Empire. Go--find a new life in the Republic.
You're free to go.
You may discover we're not the enemy you think.
What? I... only a fool would question such a generous offer. I thank you.
Perhaps our paths will cross again. Farewell, Jedi.
You'll get no mercy from me.
By ending you. [Kill him]
I asked for none. Do as you must.
Lord Angral, I've had no time to conduct my interrogation. Preparing for the Jedi took priority.
You've made far too many decisions without my consultation, Watcher.
Angral.
Of course you're behind this.
Lord Angral, my interrogation is complete. Transmitting my report to you now.
Your efficiency will be noted. Take Doctor Godera to Dromund Kaas. I have plans for him.
You never mentioned you were working for Angral.
What is this? Explain yourself, Watcher.
To ensure mission success, I compromised with the Jedi. He's here for the doctor.
To ensure mission success, I compromised with the Jedi. She's here for the doctor.
You... compromised? With the Jedi vermin who killed my son?
You escaped me on Ord Mantell and Nar Shaddaa. You will not be so fortunate this time.
I've foiled all your efforts, Angral. This time won't be any different.
I think I will.
Perhaps I should be grateful. You've spared me the effort of hunting you down.
Stop throwing your lackeys at me. If you want to end this, do it in person.
Come and face me.
You talk a big game from across the galaxy, Angral.
Your threats are a joke.
We'll be face-to-face soon enough. You will beg for mercy.
Keep throwing your forces at me, Angral. I enjoy taking them apart.
The hatred is mutual.
You underestimate the strength of my wrath. You cannot win.
Watcher, bring me this filth alive. I'll kill him myself.
Watcher, bring me this filth alive. I'll kill her myself.
Respectfully, my lord, I think it's wiser to escape with the doctor while I still can.
Enough! Do as I command!
As you wish, Lord Angral.
You're heavily outnumbered, Jedi. These are my very best agents. I would prefer that you surrender.
My mission is to rescue Doctor Godera, and that's what I intend to do.
I can't do that.
Respectfully, my lord, I'm duty-bound to honor our bargain.
Don't trifle with me! I want that Jedi!
Very well, Lord Angral.
I apologize for reneging on our deal, but I have orders. You understand. I recommend you surrender.
Give me Doctor Godera. Walk away, while you still can.
I can't do that.
We seem to be at an impasse.
Despite your rank, you're still just a slave to the Sith.
You're just Angral's tool.
Being a good servant does not make one a slave. I'd think a Jedi would understand that.
This is not the ending I would have chosen.
I'm here for the doctor--and some payback.
Time for you to die. [Attack]
That's enough bloodshed. Let's be professional about this.
I'm Watcher One with Imperial Intelligence. Those men you fought served me.
How did you find out about this operation so quickly?
This place was a secret.
What kind of name is that?
Watcher One?
My title is who I am. Any other name I gave you would be a lie.
Your agents slaughtered Republic citizens. That's an act of war.
You murdered my people.
On the contrary, it was self-preservation.
Despite what General Var Suthra believes, I've known about this outpost for some time. Your imminent arrival forced me to take action.
My mission is to protect the Empire from Doctor Godera's weapons. I'm afraid I can't let you have him.
There's nothing you can do to stop me.
You don't have a choice.
Don't insult my intelligence. The Empire only wants to destroy the Republic.
This isn't about protection.
Believe what you will.
And I'm afraid you'll have to die.
You're a dead man.
I don't fear you.
Imperial Intelligence prides itself on accurate threat assessment. I've known you were coming; analyzed your strengths and weaknesses in preparation.
You allowed the fallen Jedi, Bengel Morr, to flee Tython. Your loyalty to the Jedi Order is questionable.
You executed Bengel Morr on Tython when he was defenseless. You consider yourself above the law.
You murdered the Twi'lek Matriarch in cold blood on Tython. Of course, she did betray you.
What's he talking about? Is that true?
Watcher One statement = true?
He's an Imperial spy. He tells lies for a living.
Ignore him.
I have no cause to lie when facts will suffice.
If I did do something like that, wouldn't it be for a good reason?
Does it matter?
Regardless, your decision reveals much about your nature.
I never did anything like that.
[Lie] He's lying.
Your desire to conceal your actions is also well documented.
You defeated the fallen Jedi, Bengel Morr, to become a Knight. You're an exemplar of your order.
Either this guy reads minds, or he's got spies on Tython.
Imperial Intelligence = infiltrated Tython?
He could've acquired this information from any number of sources.
We don't know that.
The point is, I have it.
He's trying to get under our skin. Make us paranoid.
Don't let him get to you.
Your mental state is immaterial to the situation.
Tython is the Council's problem. Killing this man is ours.
That's not our problem.
As fortune would have it, Doctor Godera will be in my custody shortly. You've already failed.
The Force is with me. I'll find Doctor Godera--and you.
Not while I'm still standing.
You've confused me with someone else. I don't intimidate easily.
Was that supposed to hurt me?
This isn't about intimidation, Jedi. It's about facts.
Even if I don't get Doctor Godera, I'll still get you. That's a promise.
You won't get away with this.
Watchers aren't easily caught.
I see my reinforcements are finally in position.
Terminate her.
Terminate him.
Whoever you are, you've already seen too much.
